meaningMnemonic: Remember how 文化 means "culture?" Well add <kanji>festival</kanji> to it and you end up with a <vocabulary>culture festival</vocabulary>! These happen all the time at Japanese schools, so sometimes they're called <vocabulary>school festival</vocabulary>s too.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You've learned all of these readings already, good for you!
